links.title: Joe Rogan's podcast offers a vital canvas for new perspectives and critical thought
links.description: This past Friday, Joe Rogan treated his audience to a three-hour long conversation with Kanye West, one of the most prolific and heterodox visionaries of our time. In a sense, it was the quintessential Joe Rogan podcast - filled with priceless insights, words of wisdom and riveting, long-winded tangents about life, mental health and creative pursuits.

links.title: Joe Rogan's podcast is a vehicle for intolerance
links.description: In December of 2019, a Texas court ordered infamous conspiracy theorist Alex Jones to pay $100,000 dollars for claiming that the 2012 Sandy Hook shooting, in which Adam Lanza killed 20 children and six educators, was a hoax. Jones was found guilty of using his platform, Infowars, to spread misinformation and was later banned from Facebook, YouTube and Apple.

$SPOT Spotify Had an Earnings Miss. The Stock Is a Buy, an Analyst Says. 

https://newsfilter.io/a/7c5bd6a528ea91b8cd43c5eb8aefcffa

links.title: Spotify Had an Earnings Miss. The Stock Is a Buy, an Analyst Says.
links.description: Spotify Technology stock is down since a disappointing quarterly earnings report last week. An analyst at CFRA thinks now is the time to buy. CFRA analyst John Freeman raised his rating on Spotify shares (ticker: SPOT) to Buy from Hold in a note on Tuesday, increasing his price target to $282 from $249.

messages.body: $SPOT 5.1% retire a/c - picking up port / chart review from yesterday got sidetracked cant work out why - Spotify not that strong today still under suppression - would like to see it break that rather than bear flag - Ek the warrior https://www.tobymather.com/blog/deep-dive-spotify-strategy

links.title: Adolphus, Ek & Combined Arms: A Deep Dive Into Spotify's Strategy - TobyMather.com
links.description: Two weeks ago today, Spotify announced a new mixed-media audio format combining 'talk' and music into something they call a 'show'. The language here is carefully chosen: this is not a podcast - it's a new format, or, as Spotify names it (perhaps in a hat-tip to Apple's event naming), 'an iconic pairing'.

Spotify Rolls Out Standalone Streaming On Apple Watch App: TechCrunch  $SPOT $AAPL $SIRI $GOOGL $GOOG 

https://newsfilter.io/a/0d7e07836c337970838ac55b524c283b

links.title: Spotify Rolls Out Standalone Streaming On Apple Watch App: TechCrunch
links.description: TechCrunch reports that Spotify Technology SA (NYSE: SPOT) has rolled out a standalone streaming support feature on its Apple Watch app, two years after the launch. What Happened: The new release will sync users' podcasts or radio and stream directly to their Bluetooth earphones over Wi-Fi and cellular networks.
